snippet: A lockout in a contract dispute affects about 465 workers at an Electro-Motive locomotive factory in London, Ontario, that Caterpillar acquired in 2010.
abstract: Lockout in a contract dispute affects about 465 workers at an Electro-Motive locomotive factory in London, Ontario, that Caterpillar acquired in 2010; conflict renews debate in Canada about impact of foreign ownership on labor.
lead_paragraph: A lockout in a contract dispute affects about 465 workers at an Electro-Motive locomotive factory in London, Ontario, that Caterpillar acquired in 2010.

headline.seo: Workers Locked Out at Caterpillar Locomotive Plant in Canada
headline.main: Caterpillar Locks Out Workers in Canada
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Locks Out Workers In Canada
